attributes.action: Under 18s paying full price for services whilst on lower wages.
attributes.background: 16-17 years olds minimum wages are £3.38, however are being made to pay full adult price tickets for services such as public transport and other services.

rejection.details: Your petition does not call for a clear action to be taken by the UK Government or Parliament. If you were to resubmit your petition, calling for a clear action we would be able to consider it.
